title: Society of Homeopaths does not advise against vaccination
author: Susan C Crump; Melanie Oxley
description: EDITOR—Schmidt and Ernst concluded that some homoeopaths and chiropractors advise against measles, mumps, and rubella (MMR) vaccination. Their survey seems to have used dubious and possibly unethical methods to extract potentially sensational information.1 Public confidence in our profession may have been dealt a blow by this piece of reporting.
